WorkItem.Description: As the title says, the feral cat ability Berserk is only counted once regardless of the fight duration set. Berserk is treated as a source of energy at lines 109-110 in "CatRotationCalculator.cs". The fix is to simply update line 110, using a similar approach as done with Tiger's Fury two lines above, to take into account the fact that Berserk is available every 180s.
WorkItem.Summary: [Cat] Berserk (ability) is only counted once regardless of fight duration
